sm::eod::io::DecompressingFileReader

DecompressingFileReader Class Reference

#include <decompressingfilereader.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Allows sequential access to a log file containing compressed objects.

See also:
Example - eodcompressor

Compression Binary Format
